icp.application.classification

Interface IERPClassifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CorrelationClassifier, ERPClassifierAdapter, JavaMLClassifier, KNNClassifier, LinearDiscriminantAnalysisClassifier, MLPClassifier, SVMClassifier

    public interface IERPClassifier
    Interface for supervised classifiers in the field of ERP classification
    Author:
    Lukas Vareka

        Train the classifier using information from the supervizor
        Parameters:
        epochs - raw epochs - list of M channels x N time samples
        targets - target classes - list of expected classes (0 or 1)
        numberOfiter - number of training iterations
        fe - method for feature extraction

      • classify

        double classify(double[][] epoch)
        Calculate the output of the classifier for the selected epoch
        Parameters:
        epoch - - number of channels x temporal samples
        Returns:
        - probability of the epoch to be target; e.g. nontarget - 0, target - 1
